Key Match Events: Guard Zach LaVine had his fourth straight 30-plus scoring night.
The Bulls suffered a lopsided loss to the Pacers.
Post-Match Reflections: The article reflects on the inconsistent play of the Bulls, noting that they can lose to lower-ranked teams like the Wizards but also beat teams like the Knicks and Spurs.
The Bulls' executive vice president of basketball operations, Arturas Karnisovas, was expected to take a hard look at the team's performance.
